chapters.title: Chapter 33:  The Prince's Tabac
chapters.info: Harnan, p. 569—Lantern-jawed, sturdily-built Tairen Redarm, a file-leader in the Band of the Red Hand. He has a heavy jaw, a long-suffering expression, and a crude hawk tatoo on his left cheek. Talmanes swears by him, a veteran and survivor of both “the Six-Story Slaughter” and the incident at Hinderstap.
